content.rendered:
In this FREE guide you will learn…

  • If your release cycle is causing your team unnecessary stress and limiting their productivity,

  • Why you may rely too much on your operator/systems team to keep your deployments on schedule,

  • How releasing as frequently as possible actually decreases the risk of failed deployments.
